attributes.action: Condemn Red Cross sacking of Bryan Barkley
attributes.additional_details:
The British Red Cross has sacked a volunteer of 20 years service because of his views in support of traditional marriage.

I ask that David Cameron make it clear that the action taken by the Red Cross does not have his support, and is not what he wanted to happen when he changed the laws on marriage.

In addition I call on David Cameron to re-examine the protections in law for those who express support for traditional marriage in light of this, and other similar, actions taken to persecute supporters of traditional marriage.
